text.text: Sega's final home console. CPU Hitachi SH-4 32-bit RISC @200MHz, 16MB RAM, 8MB Vid.RAM, 2MB Aud.RAM, 128KB VMU, Graph 100MHz PowerVR2, Sound 67MHz Yamaha AICA 32-bit ARM7 RISC CPU core, 64 ch. Release date JP: 27 Nov '98 NA: 09 Sep '99 EU: 14 Oct ' 99 AU: 30 Nov '99.
